articles.title: How to stop being scared: Learning to love code
articles.summary: Writing code is less about “just working”. Instead, it’s much more about creativity. It’s similar to creative writing in that the author architecting a story must use an assortment of tools and components (i.e., content) in a way to satisfy a particular objective.
